div.head: TO THE RIGHT REVEREND FATHER IN GOD, LEWES Lord Bishop of Bangor.
div.p:
THe Angell of God which hath hitherto protected your Lordship from many most knowne and imminent dangers, tarry round about you and still deliver you. I am the
eldest sonne of your body, this is the eldest birth of my minde. By you I have beene consecrated vnto Gods service, and doe consecrate this mine againe by you vnto his glory and the Churches good.

closer.dateline: From my Chamber in Exon Coll. Novemb. 6. Anno Dom. 1630.
closer.signed: Your Sonne in all obedience to bee commanded. IOHN BAYLY.
